font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 公平： lack of favoritism toward one side or another
【例】 the lower wages工资 paid to women for equal work violated the notion of equity
【近】 disinterestedness, equity, evenhandedness, fairness, impartiality, neutrality, nonpartisanship
【反】 bias, favoritism, nonobjectivity, one-sidedness, partiality, partisanship, prejudice 歧视，偏见
【派】 equitable a.公平的
【反】 biased, discriminatory 偏袒的，差别对待的
【记】 equal 平等 + ty 名词
